data.title: Tavily Search
data.tool_description: 专为人工智能代理 (LLM) 构建的搜索引擎工具，可快速提供实时、准确和真实的结果。

human_description.en_US: The search query you want to execute with Tavily.
human_description.zh_Hans: 您想用 Tavily 执行的搜索查询。
human_description.pt_BR: The search query you want to execute with Tavily.
human_description.ja_JP: The search query you want to execute with Tavily.

paramSchemas.name: search_depth
paramSchemas.llm_description: The depth of the search. 'basic' for standard search, 'advanced' for more comprehensive results.

paramSchemas.name: topic
paramSchemas.llm_description: The category of the search. Options include 'general', 'news', or 'finance'.

paramSchemas.name: days

human_description.en_US: The number of days back from the current date to include in the search results (only applicable when "topic" is "news").
human_description.zh_Hans: 从当前日期起向前追溯的天数，以包含在搜索结果中（仅当"topic"为"news"时适用）。
human_description.pt_BR: The number of days back from the current date to include in the search results (only applicable when "topic" is "news").
human_description.ja_JP: The number of days back from the current date to include in the search results (only applicable when "topic" is "news").

paramSchemas.llm_description: The number of days back from the current date to include in the search results. Only applicable when "topic" is "news".

paramSchemas.name: time_range

human_description.en_US: The time range back from the current date to filter results.
human_description.zh_Hans: 从当前日期起向后筛选结果的时间范围。
human_description.pt_BR: The time range back from the current date to filter results.
human_description.ja_JP: The time range back from the current date to filter results.

paramSchemas.llm_description: The time range back from the current date to filter results. Options include 'not_specified', 'day', 'week', 'month', or 'year'.

paramSchemas.name: max_results

human_description.en_US: The maximum number of search results to return.
human_description.zh_Hans: 要返回的最大搜索结果数。
human_description.pt_BR: The maximum number of search results to return.
human_description.ja_JP: The maximum number of search results to return.

paramSchemas.llm_description: The maximum number of search results to return. Range is 1-20.

paramSchemas.name: include_images

human_description.en_US: Include a list of query-related images in the response.
human_description.zh_Hans: 在响应中包含与查询相关的图片列表。
human_description.pt_BR: Include a list of query-related images in the response.
human_description.ja_JP: Include a list of query-related images in the response.

paramSchemas.llm_description: When set to true, includes a list of query-related images in the response.

paramSchemas.name: include_image_descriptions

human_description.en_US: When include_images is True, adds descriptive text for each image.
human_description.zh_Hans: 当 include_images 为 True 时，为每个图像添加描述文本。
human_description.pt_BR: When include_images is True, adds descriptive text for each image.
human_description.ja_JP: When include_images is True, adds descriptive text for each image.

paramSchemas.llm_description: When include_images is True and this is set to true, adds descriptive text for each image.

paramSchemas.name: include_answer

human_description.en_US: Include a short answer to the original query in the response.
human_description.zh_Hans: 在响应中包含对原始查询的简短回答。
human_description.pt_BR: Include a short answer to the original query in the response.
human_description.ja_JP: Include a short answer to the original query in the response.

paramSchemas.llm_description: When set to true, includes a short answer to the original query in the response.

paramSchemas.name: include_raw_content

human_description.en_US: Include the cleaned and parsed HTML content of each search result.
human_description.zh_Hans: 包含每个搜索结果的已清理和解析的HTML内容。
human_description.pt_BR: Include the cleaned and parsed HTML content of each search result.
human_description.ja_JP: Include the cleaned and parsed HTML content of each search result.

paramSchemas.llm_description: When set to true, includes the cleaned and parsed HTML content of each search result.

paramSchemas.name: include_domains

human_description.en_US: A comma-separated list of domains to specifically include in the search results.
human_description.zh_Hans: 要在搜索结果中特别包含的域的逗号分隔列表。
human_description.pt_BR: A comma-separated list of domains to specifically include in the search results.
human_description.ja_JP: A comma-separated list of domains to specifically include in the search results.

paramSchemas.llm_description: A comma-separated list of domains to specifically include in the search results.

paramSchemas.name: exclude_domains

human_description.en_US: A comma-separated list of domains to specifically exclude from the search results.
human_description.zh_Hans: 要从搜索结果中特别排除的域的逗号分隔列表。
human_description.pt_BR: A comma-separated list of domains to specifically exclude from the search results.
human_description.ja_JP: A comma-separated list of domains to specifically exclude from the search results.

paramSchemas.llm_description: A comma-separated list of domains to specifically exclude from the search results.
